column4: 10.04.4 can't add app to list in right click (on folder) "open with" menu.  Anyone know of a fix for this?  I can't find one myself.
10.04.4 can't add app to list in right click (on folder) "open with" menu.  Anyone know of a fix for this?  I can't find one myself.
No zykotick9 - what I want to is add an app to this list of open with apps when I right click on a folder.  Say for instance, movie player for a folder of mp3's.
normally, when you right click a file you can select 'Other Application'.. after doing so the next time you right click the same file type it'll offer that application as a choice in the drop down
